question: A car covers a distance of 240 km in 4 hours. What is its average speed?
A train running at a speed of 90 km/h crosses a pole in 18 seconds. What is the length of the train?
A person walks at 5 km/h for 2 hours and then at 6 km/h for 3 hours. What is his average speed for the journey?
Two trains 120 m and 180 m long are moving in opposite directions at speeds of 42 km/h and 48 km/h, respectively. How long will they take to cross each other?
A train 180 meters long crosses a platform 240 meters long in 24 seconds. What is the speed of the train in km/h?
A car covers a certain distance at 60 km/h and returns at 90 km/h. What is the average speed for the entire journey?
A man walks 3 km/h and cycles 9 km/h. He covers 36 km in 6 hours. How much distance did he walk?
A boat covers 30 km downstream in 2 hours and the same distance upstream in 3 hours. What is the speed of the current?
A person crosses a 600-meter-long street in 5 minutes. What is his speed in km/h?
Two trains start at the same time from stations A and B towards each other. They meet after 5 hours. One train is 60 km/h; the other is 80 km/h. What is the distance between A and B?
If a person reduces his speed by 20%, he reaches office 15 minutes late. What is the original travel time?
A cyclist covers 1/3 of the distance at 10 km/h, next 1/3 at 15 km/h, and last 1/3 at 30 km/h. What is the average speed?
A train running at 72 km/h takes 45 seconds to cross a bridge. If the length of the train is 400 meters, what is the length of the bridge?
If a man walks at 5 km/h, he misses a train by 7 minutes. If he walks at 6 km/h, he reaches the station 5 minutes early. What is the distance to the station?
A cyclist covers a distance of 36 km in 3 hours. What is his speed in meters per second?
A train 300 meters long passes a bridge in 24 seconds while moving at a speed of 72 km/h. What is the length of the bridge?
A car traveling at a speed of 75 km/h covers a certain distance in 4 hours. How long will it take to cover the same distance at 60 km/h?
A man running at 12 km/h crosses a bridge in 2 minutes. What is the length of the bridge?
A boat takes 3 hours to go 30 km downstream, and 5 hours to return upstream. What is the speed of the stream?
Two persons A and B start from points 60 km apart at the same time, walking towards each other. A walks at a speed of 4 km/h and B at 6 km/h. In how many hours will they meet?
A man goes from Hyderabad to Bangalore at a uniform speed of 35 kmph and comes back to Hyderabad at a uniform speed of 65 kmph. His average speed for the whole journey is ___.

Peter travels from his home to a famous tea stall. One-third of his journey is covered at the rate of 25 kmph, one-fourth at the rate of 30 kmph and the rest at 50 kmph. The average speed for the whole journey is __
A traveler completes 30 km of a journey at the speed of 6 kmph and the remaining 40 km of the journey in 5 hours. His average speed for the whole journey is __ .
